data.meta_description: Zavallilar (movie): Three poor friends who met in prison have been sent to on various offenses. These three friends do not want to get out when they are released. What are Abuzer, Haci and Arap going to do when they will be out? They have no one, no ...
data.text: Zavallilar (movie): Three poor friends who met in prison have been sent to on various offenses. These three friends do not want to get out when they are released.
